"Underground" has a stronger connection to "hole" than to "alien", though some alien fiction involves underground settings.

"Galaxy" has a strong connection to "alien" and a reasonable connection to "hole" through black holes.

"Crater" has a very strong connection to "hole" and a moderate connection to "alien" through space associations.
